body:
# Phil Freeman

_Software developer specializing in C#/.NET with solid OO fundamentals. Focus on API design, best practices and functional programming._

* [Blog](http://typesandotherdistractions.com)
* [Twitter](http://twitter.com/paf31)
* [GitHub](http://github.com/paf31)
* [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=71286157)

## Skills

* C#, .NET, CIL, LINQ, EF, WCF, Rx, Silverlight, MSTest
* Azure, App Engine
* Java
* Haskell
* Javascript, HTML, CSS
* Concurrency, Patterns, OOD
* OpenGL

## Employment

* **Nowcom Corporation** _Senior Software Engineer_ 2010-Present
* **Candelis, Inc.** _Software Engineer_ 2008-2010

## Education

* **Cambridge University** _Mathematics MMath_, 2007-2008, Distinction with Honors
* **Cambridge University** _Mathematics BA_, 2004-2007, First Class with Honors
